languages.text: "Я устал быть орудием. Не орудием Лекс Империалис, а орудием конкретных людей. Они использовали меня против тебя много раз, и мне надоело".
"I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."
languages.original_text: "Я устал быть орудием. Не орудием Лекс Империалис, а орудием конкретных людей. Они использовали меня против тебя много раз, и мне надоело".

traits.locale_text: "I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."
"I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."
"I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."
"I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."
"I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."

languages.text: 「武器として利用されるのはもううんざりです。それもレックス・インペリアの武器ではなく、特定の人間たちの武器としてです。彼らは何度も何度も、あなたに対して私を利用してきました。もう我慢できません」
languages.original_text: "I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."

traits.locale_text: 「武器として利用されるのはもううんざりです。それもレックス・インペリアの武器ではなく、特定の人間たちの武器としてです。彼らは何度も何度も、あなたに対して私を利用してきました。もう我慢できません」

languages.text: "Ich bin es leid, als Waffe benutzt zu werden. Nicht als Waffe des Lex Imperia, sondern bestimmter Personen. Sie haben mich wieder und wieder gegen Euch benutzt, und ich bin es leid."
languages.original_text: "I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin es leid, als Waffe benutzt zu werden. Nicht als Waffe des Lex Imperia, sondern bestimmter Personen. Sie haben mich wieder und wieder gegen Euch benutzt, und ich bin es leid."

languages.text: « J'en ai assez qu'on se serve de moi comme d'une arme. Non pas une arme au service de la Lex Imperialis, mais de certains intérêts particuliers. Ces gens m'ont trop souvent utilisé contre vous, et cette seule pensée me rend malade. »
languages.original_text: "I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai assez qu'on se serve de moi comme d'une arme. Non pas une arme au service de la Lex Imperialis, mais de certains intérêts particuliers. Ces gens m'ont trop souvent utilisé contre vous, et cette seule pensée me rend malade. »

languages.text: «Estoy cansado de que me usen como arma. Y no me refiero a un arma de la Lex Imperialis, sino de personas específicas. Me han usado contra usted una y otra vez, y ya estoy harto».
languages.original_text: "I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy cansado de que me usen como arma. Y no me refiero a un arma de la Lex Imperialis, sino de personas específicas. Me han usado contra usted una y otra vez, y ya estoy harto».

languages.text: “我已经不想再被人当成武器来使唤了。我不是帝国律法的武器，而是某些人的武器。那些人一次又一次利用我来对付你，我已经受够了。”
languages.original_text: "I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."

traits.locale_text: “我已经不想再被人当成武器来使唤了。我不是帝国律法的武器，而是某些人的武器。那些人一次又一次利用我来对付你，我已经受够了。”

languages.text: "Artık bir silah gibi kullanılmaktan yoruldum. Lex İmperialis'in silahı değil de belli kişilerden bahsediyorum. Defalarca beni kullandılar, bıktım."
languages.original_text: "I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."

traits.locale_text: "Artık bir silah gibi kullanılmaktan yoruldum. Lex İmperialis'in silahı değil de belli kişilerden bahsediyorum. Defalarca beni size karşı kullandılar, bıktım."

languages.original_text: "I'm tired of being used as a weapon. Not a weapon of the Lex Imperialis, but of specific people. They have used me against you time and time again, and I'm sick of it."
